body:
- Added a license (#51)
- Added a fix for the windows keyboard and mouse (#53)
- Added CODE (#45) 
- Added SOUND_STOP (#58) 
- Added support for pressing the "clear" key on windows

name: 0.3.1-beta
body:
- Added a license (#51)
- Added a fix for the windows keyboard and mouse (#53)
- Added CODE (#45) 
- Added SOUND_STOP (#58)

* Keyboard library re-worked by @duncte123 to use pyautogui
  * This will probably fix many bugs with certain keys not working in certain programs, especially on Windows
* Launchpad X Support by @NullMember 
* Root no longer needed on Linux (thanks @duncte123 )
* LPHKscript errors no longer logged
* *README has NOT been updated yet*

This release includes a Windows install wizard, a Windows portable version, and the source code. The source code contains a beta install script for Linux. A Linux portable version is in the works, although there are many bugs still on Linux.

name: 0.3.0_pr35_07042020

* Fixed (?) Linux root issues

This release includes a Windows install wizard, a Windows portable version, and the source code. The source code contains a beta install script for Linux. A Linux portable version is in the works, although there are many bugs still on Linux.

name: 0.2.9-b.0
body:
* Added beta support for the `@LOAD_LAYOUT` command
  * See `all_delays_all_*ay.lpl` for an example of toggling

This release includes a Windows install wizard, a Windows portable version, and the source code. The source code contains a beta install script for Linux. A Linux portable version is in the works, although there are many bugs still on Linux.

* Fixed critical bug where only a comment breaks the script parser

This release includes a Windows install wizard, a Windows portable version, and the source code. The source code contains a beta install script for Linux. A Linux portable version is in the works, although there are many bugs still on Linux.

* Auto-connect to Launchpad
* Easier to redetect Launchpad
* Allowed comments and whitespace to come before headers
* Put logger in its own module

This release includes a Windows install wizard, a Windows portable version, and the source code. The source code contains a beta install script for Linux. A Linux portable version is in the works, although there are many bugs still on Linux.

* Much better error handling of script validation exceptions
* Much better logging, including `STDERR`

This release includes a Windows install wizard, a Windows portable version, and the source code. The source code contains a beta install script for Linux. A Linux portable version is in the works, although there are many bugs still on Linux.

**Better logging, better path management, LPHK.**
* Fixed bugs with Linux/PyInstaller paths
* Added more detailed logging

This release includes a Windows install wizard, a Windows portable version, and the source code. The source code contains a beta install script for Linux. A Linux portable version is in the works, although there are many bugs still on Linux.

* Fixed various major bugs on Linux

This release includes a Windows install wizard, a Windows portable version, and the source code. The source code contains a beta install script for Linux.

* Used uncompressed build for installed version (much faster startup)
* Allow the user to select the user folder
* Changed where the program version is read
* Cleaned up text formatting
* Fixed bug with user folder and sound library
* Fixed initial directory when selecting files

This release includes a Windows install wizard, a Windows portable version, and the source code. The source code contains a beta install script for Linux.

* Add option to install for all users (default)
* When installed, will use an `LPHK` user folder in the User's `My Documents` folder
* Added uninstall entry icon
* Fixed bug in Classic color picker where colors displayed as washed out
* Removed accidental lowercase duplicate folders

This release includes a Windows install wizard, a Windows portable version, and the source code. The source code contains a beta install script for Linux.

* Fixed PyInstaller path issues
* Added dual file/stdout logging
* Changed log name
* Re-factored `make_release.bat`
* Put portable files in an `LPHK` folder inside the .zip

This release includes a Windows install wizard, a Windows portable version, and the source code. The source code contains a beta install script for Linux.

* Using PyInstall on Windows now
* No MiniConda required!  All you need is LPHK.exe!
* Fixed icons

This release includes a Windows install wizard, a Windows portable version, and the source code. The source code contains a beta install script for Linux.

* Fix Classic color picker round down bug
* Fixed default script color for Classic
* Fixed bug with padding and button click detection

This release includes a Windows install wizard and the source code. The source code contains a beta install script for Linux.

* Automatically minimize the log window on Windows
* New About image

This release includes a Windows install wizard and the source code. The source code contains a beta install script for Linux.

Update JSON files (.lpl) to be formatted for human readability.
